segments.text: It ’ s quite an interesting place to live . The best thing to do in my city is go shopping . There are several indoor and outdoor markets , department stores and shopping malls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is the traffic bad in the city centre ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . Cars are not permitted in several parts of city centre , especially in the main shopping areas . The public transport system is pretty good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there a lot of nightlife in your city ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are several good clubs near the city centre . Many people in my city prefer something more cultural , so we several theatres and venues for classical music concerts and operas .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds like a really exciting city to live in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is . I hope you ’ ll have time to come for a visit soon . You really should come during the summer , when the weather is better and there ’ s more happening outdoors .
